page.title: 05The Gayton Community Minibus
page.content:
The mini-bus service started on Friday 25th May 1984 because there was no satisfactory public bus service for the people in Gayton and Tiffield. It is run by volunteers who also take it in turns to drive the bus. The Minibus is owned by the Nothampton County Council who always make sure that the scheme does not lose too much money.The United Counties Bus Company help with the repairs. You can only fit 12 adults or 16 children into the bus. The driver must not pick up other passengers on the way. Fares - Gayton/Northampton
adult 73p(single) 120p(return)
child 37p 60p
